mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT is_open, is_zgys, project_id, project_code, project_name, purchase, purchase_style_name, status_name, stop_time, tender_id, tender_name, package_id, package_name, supplier_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pb.is_open, pb.is_zgys, pb.project_id, pb.project_code, pb.project_name, pb.purchase, pb.purchase_style_name, pb.status_name, pb.stop_time, t.tender_id, t.tender_name, p.package_id, p.package_name, si.supplier_id FROM project_base_info pb, project_tender_info t, project_package_info p, project_supplier_info s, supplier_info si WHERE t.tender_id IS NOT NULL AND pb.project_id = p.project_id AND pb.project_id = t.project_id AND p.tender_id = t.tender_id AND pb.project_id = s.project_id AND s.supplier_id = si.supplier_id AND pb.is_zgys = '0' AND si.supplier_id = #{supplier_id} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT pb.is_open, pb.is_zgys, pb.project_id, pb.project_code, pb.project_name, pb.purchase, pb.purchase_style_name, pb.status_name, pb.stop_time, NULL, '标1', p.package_id, p.package_name, si.supplier_id FROM project_base_info pb, project_package_info p, project_supplier_info s, supplier_info si WHERE p.tender_id IS NULL AND pb.project_id = p.project_id AND pb.project_id = s.project_id AND s.supplier_id = si.supplier_id AND pb.is_zgys = '0' AND si.supplier_id = #{supplier_id} ) x order by x.stop_time desc,x.package_name
